name: Test Data Migration
description: Migrating Test Data from 100+ Excel Templates to Postgres Database with Django Rest Framework
detail: Imagine that we have 100+ different testing methods, all with unique data structure.For XX years it's been practice that all the data is in Excel template now need to be migrated to an SQL database

name: Test Method Framework
description: Design a framework to encapsulate test data & algorithm with Python
detail: Excel template are basically not the future proof tool for any company. A web based system would be the right tool for a job. Form a working group that designs a framework for a test template with very little entry level.

name: Test Operation Dashboard
description: Visualize data from Excel Trackers & SQL Database using Tableau
detail: A simple visualization for capacity planning tool for the operation. Visualization is then being published to the company's Tableau server and updates the Excel Tracker (in shared drive) periodically.

name: Master Data Development
description: Collaboratively work with people across teams to develop a master data for test department
detail: Excel within share drive is not a proper tool to store master data ! And it should not have a scattered ownership. Data are meant to be communicate with each other and a working group is form to tackle this problem. Brainstorming session takes place from different team and a prototype is build on top of MS Access which allows data to structure in SQL structure. Proper solution is then being made with Django & Postgres deployed in dedicated Ubuntu Server

name: Excel Development Panel
description: Founder of the forum to discuss about how to better develop tool using Excel that is compatible with standard & future proof practice
detail: Driving people to discuss and develop a standard solution to Excel Templates. This helps people to build a better scalable & maintainable Excel templates. Few example is using Bitbucket version control to control template version. The group also open to any possible alternative such as Python or Javascript

name: Lab Scheduling Tool & File Management System
description: A simple lab scheduling tool with visualization for capacity planning
detail: Build on top of Excel and Excel VBA, manipulating the cells to render the viz. Realized that Excel has performance issue to do this kind of things. Few labs is still using them today
